verbs.description: PHILADELPHIA -- A senior living facility nurse [V: has] been charged in connection with the death of Herbert R. McMaster Sr . , the father of President Donald Trump 's former national security adviser , the state 's Attorney General Josh Shapiro announced Thursday .

PHILADELPHIA -- A senior living facility nurse has [V: been] charged in connection with the death of Herbert R. McMaster Sr . , the father of President Donald Trump 's former national security adviser , the state 's Attorney General Josh Shapiro announced Thursday .
